byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: The Chartis unit of the bailed-out insurer, which took a public beating during the financial crisis, is now offering insurance against negative publicity.
snippet: The Chartis unit of the bailed-out insurer, which took a public beating during the financial crisis, is now offering insurance against negative publicity.

headline.main: A.I.G. Is Now Worried About Bad P.R. -- for Policyholders
